argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_modid0 | |- ( M e. RR+ -> ( M mod M ) = 0 ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( M mod M ) = 0 ) |
| 3 |  | #P_modge0 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> 0 <_ ( A mod M ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eqbrtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( M mod M ) <_ ( A mod M ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 6 |  | #P_rpre | |- ( M e. RR+ -> M e. RR ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> M e. RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> M e. RR+ ) |
| 9 |  | #P_modsubdir | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( M mod M ) <_ ( A mod M ) <-> ( ( A - M ) mod M ) = ( ( A mod M ) - ( M mod M ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 7, 8, 9 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( M mod M ) <_ ( A mod M ) <-> ( ( A - M ) mod M ) = ( ( A mod M ) - ( M mod M ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A - M ) mod M ) = ( ( A mod M ) - ( M mod M ) ) ) |
| 12 | 2 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> 0 = ( M mod M ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod M ) - 0 ) = ( ( A mod M ) - ( M mod M ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_modcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod M ) e. RR ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod M ) e. CC ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_subid1d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod M ) - 0 ) = ( A mod M ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 13, 16 | #P_3eqtr2rd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod M ) = ( ( A - M ) mod M ) ) |
